Class EndScreen

java.lang.Object
EndScreen
public class EndScreen extends Object
This displays the End Screen or the Questions Screen.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public static void setup(boolean q)
      Sets up the screen.
      Parameters:
      q - If true, the Questions screen is set up. If false, the End Screen is set up.

    • getSavedData

      public static int[] getSavedData()
      Checks if there is a file in the system named "High Score.txt". If there is, returns an integer array of saved data if the necessary data is there. The integer array consists of the stage number and the budget remaining in that order. If there is no file, returns null. If there is the file with the name "High Score.txt" but it does not have the necessary data, returns null.
      Returns:
      Null or An integer array with the stage number and the budget remaining in that order.

    • writeFile

      public static void writeFile()
      Writes and updates "High Score.txt" to store the user's high score.

    • questionsMode

      public static boolean questionsMode()
      Returns questionsMode.
      Returns:
      questionsMode

    • setQuestionsMode

      public static void setQuestionsMode(boolean val)
      Sets questionsMode to val.
      Parameters:
      val - a certain boolean value
